Games.Name: 4 Degrees: The Arc of Trivia: Bible Edition
Games.Overview: 4 Degrees: The Arc of Trivia is a trivia game published by ZAPiT Games in 2005 as a pack-in game with the Game Wave Family Entertainment System. The game is heavily inspired by Trivial Pursuit. 4 Degrees supports 1-6 player multiplayer gameplay with the purchase of additional remotes.

Games.Name: Letter Zap!
Games.Overview: In Letter Zap! four players simultaneously have a grid of letters in which the goal is to find as many words as possible. In order to make a word the letters must the touching, and any letter can only be used once in a single word. The game plays almost identically to Boggle.
